ModMetaData.name: Kit's Portuguese Pack
ModMetaData.author: Kitsune, vermibvs, junio.king, Rasutei, Sr.dino, LuizFernando6Th, Uslyst
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to add portuguese translation to some mods :)
